title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.41 - Ice skating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.41 - Ice skating

State Regulations
(a) Ice skating
is permitted only at skating areas or rinks maintained by ParksCorp for such
use, at such times, and subject to the regulations prescribed and posted at
each facility. (b) No person shall
go upon the ice of any fountain, pond or stream in any park except at such
places and at such times as may be designated by

ParksCorp. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
